H0.text: Friction is the force that occurs because no surface is perfectly smooth.

H1.text: Vibration is the force that occurs because no surface is perfectly smooth.

H2.text: Gravity is the force that occurs because no surface is perfectly smooth.

H3.text: Tension is the force that occurs because no surface is perfectly smooth.

A4.text: Static friction is considered to arise as the result of surface roughness features across multiple length scales at solid surfaces.
